entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] output path passed to `dotnet publish` does not result in a runnable project at the published path #94319
  • error MC1000: Unknown build error, 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' #94318
  • Reconsider property injection with required properties #94323
  • Use of `ref readonly` instead of `in` in libraries is a breaking change for F# callers #94317
  • CoreCLRTestLibrary `TestLibrary.Utilities.IsNativeAot` adds ~4mb to the NativeAOT exe on Linux #94313
  • Investigate/optimize performance of TrimAnalysisPatterns tracked by ILLink Roslyn analyzer #94312
  • Guide for building standalone mono cross based runtime #94311
  • DependencyContext RuntimeGraph expected behavior. #94305
  • SocketsHttpHandler cannot authenticate NTLM with username format user@domain.com #94303
  • [wasi] Print message with `AppBundle` path after build/publish #94291
    8.0.x
  • Memory leak when serializing large string properties with System.Text.Json #94290
  • Improve and unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #94289
    9.0.0
  • [InlineArray] should not have [EditorBrowsableState(Never)] #94283

Closed

  • System.Text.Json JsonConverter doesn't serialize nullable properties #94314
  • [API Proposal]: Add an interface to unify property/field access #90901
    Future
  • dotnet run quits immediately on Mac (Apple Silicon) in certain scenarios. #94315
  • ServiceProviderEngineScope captures the same object twice into a list of disposables #91179
    Future
  • Get Span view of embedded resource data #26101
    Future
  • Use Vector512<T> in SpanHelpers.Fill #94276
  • [API Proposal]: Indexer / GetItem for {Immutable}HashSet #94302
  • Error: Using UserPrincipal.GetGroups() get an exception (A local error has occurred) #94282
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator encounters namespace conflicts in using statements #93498
    9.0.0
  • IntersectBy second parameter has wrong type #94296
  • WASI apps are too big #94286
    9.0.0
  • Debugger display of dictionary types and `DebuggerDisplayAttribute.Name` #88736
    Future
  • Wasm Test failure: 'C:\helix\work\workitem\e\wbt' is not a valid project file #94281

PullRequests

Created

  • Make System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests run sequentially #94324
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • JIT: revise local assertion prop to use bit vectors #94322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide Microsoft.Win32.Registry.AccessControl package readme #94321
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Re-enable S.T.Json with source generation tests #94320
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94308
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. (#94267) #94307
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][ci] Improve CI perf by excluding intermediate dir from iOS app bundles #94304
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] fix stale memory on suspended thread #94299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • Restore EETypeNode to the state before we deleted reflection blocking #94287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove Ubuntu 18.04 from libraries Helix queues #94293
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Small cleanup for Lock in Mono #94275
    area-VM-threading-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] improve promise resolve marshaling after exit #94288
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 40 #94204
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix parallel SuperPMI pass-through logging #94284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix a couple interpreter pgo problems #94295
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm][AOT] Disable general Hybrid Globalization tests #94297
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. #94267
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Provide Extensions.Hosting.Systemd package readme #94055
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • JIT: morph blocks in RPO #94247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    needs-area-label
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable MT PLINQ #94214
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Format usings to match code style #94085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • we need to skip the SIP region in the last step of handling the alloc region #94249
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix redundant conditional in HttpConnection #94278
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
